Your Steam ID:
Reason:i suscide in pool when dead once 
Length of Ban:10080
What server were you playing?:Jail
Who banned you?:Pharaoh
Why should we unban you?:because i was texting when i died and i died again when i was underground somhow dround in pool

You can get your steamID by going onto any server and typing "status" into console.

I don't understand how you can not notice your head was in the water? Your camera is behind your head, so there is no way you can be underwater without seeing it.

I just banned two other people before you for doing the exact same thing.
I think people get bad impressions from your topic names. Really creates some kind of bias affect.

Decoded:

__________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Your Steam ID: STEAM_0:0:26202414
Reason: I was often suiciding in the pool by accident

Why should we unban you?: I didn't know that being in the pool in spectator would kill me, and I went AFK to I could text my friend/mom, and while I was gone apparently it made me suicide several times, causing the server to lag. Seeing this in console, Pharaoh banned me for this.
___________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Yes I did get his SteamID for you guys.
